generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to parked cars and bordered by a curb.
- building: A multi-story residential building is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- car: A black van is visible on the left side of the road, and a red car is parked on the right side.
- truck: A yellow truck is visible in the distance, driving on the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible overhead, with one showing green and another showing red.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and signs.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow is visible on the left side of the road.
